https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/eBm9Yi8YRxdcIg7mbOiKTdX0G28.jpg The original traditional one-hundred-percent red-blooded two-fisted all-American Christmas continues five years later with Ralphie, Randy, mom and the old man. This time Ralphie has his eyes fixed on a car. But trouble is sure to follow. A Christmas Story 2
